posts.excerpt: In a time when â€œcarâ€ was not even a word yet, and people relied on horses to pull their wagons, one woman challenged the status quo. To prove to the world that her husbandâ€™s invention was the future of mobility, Bertha Benz went on the first long-distance journey with an automobile, facing all kinds of challenges but stopping at nothing. The rest, as they say, is history. ä»Šå¤©çœ‹åˆ°äº†å¥”é©°çš„å›½é™…å¦‡å¥³æƒç›Šæ—¥çš„å®£ä¼ å¹¿å‘Šï¼Œå¡å°”Â·æœ¬èŒ¨çš„å¦»å­ä¼¯å°”è¨Â·æœ¬èŒ¨å¼€è½¦å¸¦ç€ä¸¤ä¸ªå­©å­å»å›å¨˜å®¶çš„æ•…äº‹ï¼Œä¸€è·¯ä¸Šèµ°èµ°åœåœï¼Œå¹³æ·¡ä¹‹ä¸­è•´å«ç€å¼ºå¤§çš„åŠ›é‡ï¼Œçªç„¶å°±æƒ³ç€ä¸ºå®ƒåšä¸€ä¸ªä¸­è‹±åŒè¯­å­—å¹•ï¼Œä¹Ÿç®—äº†å´ä¹‹å‰æ²¡æœ‰åŠ å…¥å­—å¹•ç»„çš„é—æ†¾ã€‚
posts.text: In a time when â€œcarâ€ was not even a word yet, and people relied on horses to pull their wagons, one woman challenged the status quo. To prove to the world that her husbandâ€™s invention was the future of mobility, Bertha Benz went on the first long-distance journey with an automobile, facing all kinds of challenges but stopping at nothing. The rest, as they say, is history. posts.text: çœ‹è¿™é‡Œ è¿™æ˜¯æˆ‘çš„ä¸ªäººåšå®¢ï¼Œç”± Hexo å¼€æºæ¡†æ¶å’Œ GitHub æ­å»ºè€Œæˆã€‚ Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
